channel.title: Linked List on Learn with AI
channel.description: Recent content in Linked List on Learn with AI

item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Circular Linked List ChatGPT answer: What is a circular linked list and how does it differ from a regular linked list? What are the advantages and disadvantages of using a circular linked list over a regular linked list? What is the time complexity for searching, inserting and deleting nodes in a circular linked list? How do you convert a regular linked list to a circular linked list?

Preview User ask: give me five question about Doubly Linked List ChatGPT answer: What is a doubly linked list and how is it different from a singly linked list? How do you insert a new node into a doubly linked list? How do you remove a node from a doubly linked list? What are the advantages of using a doubly linked list over other data structures? How do you search for a particular node in a doubly linked list and what is the time complexity of this operation?

Preview User ask: give me five question about Singly Linked List ChatGPT answer: What is a singly linked list and how does it differ from other types of lists? What advantage does a singly linked list have over an array when it comes to insertion and deletion operations? What are the basic operations that can be performed on a singly linked list, and how do they affect the structure of the list?
